subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, the defending champion, finds herself in the relatively unthreatening half  of the U.S. Open while three former champions and two ingénues will be blasting way in the top half of the draw.
snippet: Maria Sharapova, the defending champion, finds herself in the relatively unthreatening half  of the U.S. Open while three former champions and two ingénues will be blasting way in the top half of the draw.
